name: Learn About the Canon 70D
description: This FREE Android app covers the names of parts, symbols and terminology of the Canon 70D.  There  are   screens          covering     the      following       :       front view,  back view,  top,  LCD  screen,  view finder,   mode  dial, symbols, and terminology.   In order to use your camera effectively, you need to know the parts and functions by heart.  This is a good way to learn and practice that information. It is totally FREE and does invade your privacy at all! No ads, no personal data collection, and no internet connection. Put it on your phone and use it in the field. Enjoy.
